headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Downgraded as Analysts Reassess 2026 Growth Outlook
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one of the 10 AI Stocks Gaining Attention on Wall Street. On February 2, Scotiabank analyst Patrick Colville downgraded the stock from Sector Outperform to Sector Perform with an $85 price target. The firm sees Fortinet as a strong company, but believes that the optimism for 2026 appears overstated. It acknowledged that […]

headline: Fortinet Gears Up to Report Q4 Earnings: How to Play the Stock
summary: FTNT heads into Q4 earnings with revenues guided to $1.825-$1.885B and steady EPS, as AI data center deals shape results.

headline: Fortinet FortiCNAPP Upgrade Highlights Unified Cloud Security And Investor Implications
summary: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) has introduced major upgrades to its FortiCNAPP cloud security platform. The update adds unified, context-driven cloud security capabilities and native Data Security Posture Management. The platform now combines signals from configuration, identity, vulnerabilities, network controls, and data sensitivity into a single workflow. For investors watching cloud and cybersecurity, this move highlights how Fortinet is positioning FortiCNAPP at the center of complex hybrid...

headline: SunPower Closes Cobalt Power Systems Acquisition
summary: The Premium Silicon Valley Solar InstallerOREM, Utah, Feb. 03, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SunPower Inc. (herein “SunPower,” the “Company,” or Nasdaq: “SPWR”) a solar technology, services, and installation company, today announced that it has closed its $12 million all-equity strategic acquisition of Cobalt Power Systems (“Cobalt”) headquartered in Mountain View, California. summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Fortinet, Inc. on The Wealth Dynasty Report’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on FTNT.
